price: Araheza kandi ashira ikiganza ciwe mu kwaha, agize ngo aragikuyeyo, caje cererana gisayangana cane[17] abari ng’aho birabira, barumirwa.
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ
footnotes: [17] Ico gitangaro mu kugikora, Musa yashira ikiganza mu kwaha, akagikurayo cererana gisayangana cane; yagisubizayo kandi, akagikurayo gisa n’ibara ry’ibindi bihimba vy’umubiri wiwe.

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
